question: Setting up of captive breeding centre for Great Indian Bustard(GIB) was recently in news. Consider the following statements 1.First Captive breeding centre for GIB was set up in Rajasthan in 2014. 2.GIB is a flightless bird. 3.GIB is listed as critically endangered in IUCN Red Data List. Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Rajasthanâ€™s State bird may be extinct soon. Only 50 Great Indian Bustards left in the wild, no action on plan to save them. No progress has been made on the proposal for establishing a captive breeding centre.
